name: df-metu
body: |- wceq(cmetu, cmpt(s0, cuni(crn(cpsmet)), co(cxp(cdm(cdm(cv(s0))), cdm(cdm(cv(s0)))), cfg, crn(cmpt(s1, crp, cima(ccnv(cv(s0)), co(nat0, cico, cv(s1))))))))
comment: Define the function mapping metrics to the uniform structure generated by that metric. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 1-Dec-2017.) (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 11-Feb-2018.)
